awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 6 wins & 14 nominations.

fullplot: When Nelly, a woman being just divorced, meets by chance M. Arnaud, a mature salesman just retired, begins a strange and special relationship between the two personalities.
plot: When Nelly, a woman being just divorced, meets by chance M. Arnaud, a mature salesman just retired, begins a strange and special relationship between the two personalities.
title: Nelly & Monsieur Arnaud
